name: Italian Fish Fillets
author: Anonymous
summary: Tender white fish fillets are coated with a savory breadcrumb mixture made from Pepperidge Farm® White Sandwich Bread, Parmesan cheese, garlic, thyme, pepper and olive oil, and are baked until the fish is done and the breadcrumbs are golden brown.
ingredients: 2 slices Pepperidge Farm® White Sandwich Bread
½ teaspoon dried thyme leaves, crushed
8 (3 ounce) fillets tilapia or other firm white fish fillets*
directions: Place bread, cheese, garlic, thyme and black pepper in blender or food processor
Cover and blend until fine crumbs form
Slowly add olive oil and blend until moistened
Arrange fish fillets in large shallow roasting pan
Divide bread crumb mixture evenly over fillets
Bake at 400 degrees F for 10 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork and crumb topping is golden
